activities:
Central record keeping for employee data, including personal data and job/position data, payroll, compensation and benefits records, timekeeping, organizational charts, performance reviews and learning management systems. Customer data and business contact data also collected and stored.

Customer data privacy policy:
http://www.grassvalley.com/privacy
Human resoureces privacy policy: http://www.grassvalley.com/privacy/hr_privacy_policy
eucountries: Belgium, France, Germany, Italy, Netherlands, Spain, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: Online and offline data, including manually processed data, relating to human resources, customers and contacts.
recoursemech: The company agrees to submit to the jurisdiction of the European Union Data Protection Authorities (DPAs) for unresolved disputes involving the personal information of any individual from the European Union, as well as to that of the Federal Data Protection and Information Commissioner of Switzerland (FDPIC) for unresolved disputes involving the personal information of any individual from Switzerland.
